mapper.select: SELECT /* selectList as MainController*/ USER_ID as userId, USER_PWD as userPwd, USER_NAME as userName, EMAIL as email, USE_YN as useYn, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyy') || '년 ' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'mm') || '월' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'dd') || '일 ' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'hh24') || '시' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'mi') || '분' as InsertDate, MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate FROM TUSER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUSER /* saveSignupgo as MainController */ (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
